title: Eye Color Survey: Results in a Graph
question_text:
Jenna wanted to know more about the distribution of eye colors so she decided to take a survey of students at her school. The results are displayed in the bar chart below.

Which of the following describes the distribution?
solution:
Eye color is a categorical variable and trying to describe the shape of the distribution is completely inappropriate.

Based on how the eye colors were put in order along the horizontal axis, the graph might appear to be skewed right.

However, if we reversed the order in which the eye colors were listed, the graph would appear to be skewed to the left!
